body: my knee itches......just wanted yall to know
MC should go to the bank as Robin Dabank
Its like Goldilocks and the three bears lol

Money can be traced, but if you just randomly take money out of people's wallets it'll be impossible to do so. The only real issue is when someone steals a series of bills from a bank - hence why robbers ask for "unmarked" bills, they don't want a linear series of bill numbers to trace. That said I could see having a job even just to have an alibi or something to do. Especially if you end up working somewhere that lets you meet cute girls.

Money that can easily be traced?

Come on man.

Wtf man. First the one Guy breaks his time stop watch, Then the other fag has his stolen, Now this dumbass doesn't even fucking know how to use his properly(this might be the dude from the story where he had his stolen too I can't remember). The COMPLETE idea of time stop is Control over everything. WHY THE FUCK would I get a job when I can just stop time & walk in a bank and Take some money? There's infinite possibilities. Writers Please Stop Disgracing my beautiful Timestop genre with these halfassed stories.
